body:
Dmitry,

I did not set GOMAXPROCS, so I believe it was just one.

I've only seen this crash once, but I'll leave it running all day today and
see if anything happens.

-Dan

On Tue, Jan 13, 2015 at 1:21 AM, Dmitry Vyukov <notifications@github.com>
wrote:
